content: विरोधिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Resisting, opposing, obstructing. {@--2@} Besieging. {@--3@} Contradictory, opposed to, inconsistent with; तपोवन° <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--4@} Hostile, inimical, adverse; विरोधिसत्त्वोज्झितपूर्वमत्सरं <ls>Ku. 5. 17.</ls> {@--5@} Quarrelsome. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} An enemy; <ls>Śi. 16. 64.</ls>
